name: Insanity (Samir Georgy)
description:
Insanity is a 2D platformer designed for Andoird the iOS. For now, the available version is for Android so you can download the .apk file and install it on your mobile. The game is scheduled to be released by the end of 2020. Upon release the game will be available in both the Play and App stores.

The game is still in development so feel free to drop in any comments or suggestions that you may have on the game.

Please note that the game contains ads for testing.
